attributes.action: Accept that comprehensive education has failed and to reintroduce academic selection in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of grammer schools allowed working class children to compete with their privately educated peers on equal terms.  The removal of this opportunity has removed this chance for improvement from many and deprived the country of a wealth of talent.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Accept that comprehensive education has failed and to reintroduce academic selection in schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11134.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Grammerschools/
